subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: Chevrolet Division of General Motors Corp
lead_paragraph: Jimmie Johnson won his second consecutive pole and the 12th of his career when he took his No. 48 Chevrolet around the 1.5-mile tri-oval at Kansas Speedway at a top speed of 175.063 m.p.h. Ryan Newman’s Dodge qualified second for tomorrow’s Lifelock 400 at 174.893 m.p.h., but the car failed inspection because the roof was too low.
